alert.note: Alert for Alaska Peninsula (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 9:00PM AKDT until March 15 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TUESDAY TO 6 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. North winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Reduced visibilities to one half mile. * WHERE...Alaska Peninsula. * WHEN...From 4 AM Tuesday to 6 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty north winds develop with widespread snow showers Monday night, contributing to periods of low visibility. Gusty winds persist through at least Wednesday, though snow shower coverage may gradually decrease beyond Tuesday night. This may lead to an extended threat of blowing snow through mid-week.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
